title: Balti chicken curry
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon oil', '2 skinless chicken breasts, cubed', '1 onion, sliced', '1 green pepper, seeds removed and sliced', '1 red chilli pepper, sliced', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '1 (5cm) piece fresh ginger, peeled and grated', '1 tablespoon garam masala', '1/2 teaspoon turmeric', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 large tomato, chopped', '1 tableespoon tomato puree', '120ml water or chicken stock', '1 bay leaf', '1 teaspoon lemon juice']
